Detailed Description

This class holds texture information.

Texture data is stored as a 2D array of void pointers. Each row is one texture. Void pointers are accepted by OpenGL, and so this class complies with OpenGL. Multiple textures are used in OpenGL mipmapping.

Textures can be created from any acceptable image format.

See also:

App2
App3
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks.
Version:
1.0
